items.name: Advanced Alteration Bench
items.description: The Advanced Alteration Bench is a late game technology that allows prospectors to create Attachment Packs ( Tier 3 ) and Advanced Attachment Packs ( Tier 4 ) to upgrade armor pieces, ranged weapons, and tools. An active power connection providing at least 1,500 electricity to craft Attachment Packs is required. A power connection is not required to add and remove Attachment packs from items.

items.name: Advanced Masonry Bench
items.description: The Advanced Masonry Bench enables the construction of Scoria Brick Building Pieces and Clay Brick Building Pieces and is able to craft items made the Masonry Bench at a faster rate, but only once the prospector researches the blueprint sets for those building pieces.

items.name: Advanced Textiles Bench
items.description: Allows for the crafting of more advanced Armor sets, Cured Leather and Platinum Weave . The Advanced Textiles Bench is also able to craft items made at the Textiles Bench , removing the need for multiple benches.

items.name: Alteration Bench
items.description: The Alteration Bench is a mid-to-late game technology that allows Prospectors to create Attachment Packs to upgrade armor pieces, ranged weapons, and tools.

items.name: Animal Bed
items.description: The Animal Bed serves as a place for juvenile animals to sleep while taming and is required to tame juvenile animals. Tamed Mounts and Pets can also use the Animal Bed when tired.

items.name: Anvil Bench
items.description: The Anvil Bench is unlocked near the start of the Tier 2 Tech Tree . It enables the Prospector to craft higher quality tools such as the Iron Pickaxe and Steel Pickaxe . It is also where these tools can be repaired. While it can be placed with no shelter, it would be unusable. Will take damage if left without shelter (or under a severely damaged roof) in storms.

items.name: Arctic Chest Armor
items.description: Arctic Armor is a major upgrade to Fur Armor , offering unrivaled cold resistance.
items.crafted_at: Advanced Textiles Bench Electric Textiles Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Advanced Textiles Bench Electric Textiles Bench

items.name: Art Deco 10-Seater Table
items.description: The Art Deco 10-Seater Table is an gilded item of significant worth.

items.name: Art Deco 6-Seater Table
items.description: The Art Deco 6-Seater Table is an gilded item of significant worth.

items.name: Art Deco Bed
items.description: The Art Deco Bed allows prospectors to sleep provided it is sufficiently sheltered and it is night time in-game. In a multiplayer game, all prospectors must sleep at the same time to pass the night. Prospectors can set their respawn location to a bed, however if this bed is deconstructed or destroyed, the prospector's spawn location will reset back to the drop-pod. The Art Deco Bed has the best sleep quality of any bed.

items.name: Art Deco Dining Chair
items.description: The Art Deco Dining Chair is an gilded item of significant worth.

items.name: Art Deco Lounge Chair
items.description: The Art Deco Lounge Chair is an gilded item of significant worth.

items.name: Art Deco Round Table
items.description: The Art Deco Round Table is an gilded item of significant worth.

items.name: Art Deco Sitting Bench
items.description: The Art Deco Sitting Bench is an gilded item of significant worth.

items.name: Basic Fishing Bench
items.description: The Basic Fishing Bench is where Prospectors can craft the Wooden Fishing Rod and the Refined Wood Fishing Rod , as well as various Lures on the left hand side of the bench. The right side of the bench is used to fillet any fish caught using a Fishing Rod or Fishing Trap. Does not require shelter to be used.

items.name: Bedroll
items.description: The Bedroll allows prospectors to sleep provided it is sufficiently sheltered, a campfire/heater/dehumidifier/etc is nearby, and it is night time in-game. In a multiplayer game, all prospectors must sleep at the same time to pass the night. Sleeping will provide the Well Rested Status Effect . Prospectors can set their respawn location to a bedroll, however if this bedroll is picked up or destroyed, the prospector's spawn location will reset back to their drop pod.

items.name: Black Tusker Animal Bed
items.description: The Black Tusker Animal Bed is a bed for Mounts and Pets that has a tusker theme. It is available as part of the Creature Comforts DLC . Provides no additional attributes and is a cosmetic change to the Animal Bed .

items.name: Bone Chest Armor
items.description: Bone Armor provides relatively good protection from Icarus' fauna as a Tier 1 armor with a minor boost to temperature resistance. Also provides a considerable damage increase when a full set is worn.

items.name: Brown Bear Chest Armor
items.description: Brown Bear Armor is an upgrade to Bone Armor , offering higher physical resistance with a boost to melee attack speed. Though it may not increase attack damage, it pairs well with the Calibrated Grip Attachment s and Attack Speed Attachment s, further increasing knife attack speed.
items.crafted_at: Crafted AtTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Crafted AtTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

items.name: Brutalist 10-Seater Table
items.description: The Brutalist 10-Seater Table seats ten and is mode from concrete, copper nails and glass.

items.name: Brutalist 6-Seater Table
items.description: The Brutalist 6-Seater Table seats six, is mode from concrete, copper nails and glass.

items.name: Brutalist Bed
items.description: The Brutalist Bed is mode from concrete and platinum weave, and has an increased sleep quality.

items.name: Brutalist Coffee Table
items.description: The Brutalist Coffee Table is mode from concrete, iron and glass.

items.name: Brutalist Dining Chair
items.description: The Brutalist Dining Chair seats one and is mode from concrete and leather.

items.name: Brutalist Lounge Chair
items.description: The Brutalist Lounge Chair is a minimalist chair made with concrete and leather in the Brutalist design aesthetic. It serves as a seat for Prospectors and provides a small bonus to Coziness .

items.name: Brutalist Octagonal Table
items.description: The Brutalist Octagonal Table seats six and is mode from concrete and copper nails.

items.name: Brutalist Sitting Bench
items.description: The Brutalist Sitting Bench is made soley from concrete and seats two prospectors.

items.name: Burlap Animal Bed
items.description: The Burlap Animal Bed is a bed for Mounts and Pets that has a basic theme. It is available as part of the Creature Comforts DLC . Provides no additional attributes and is a cosmetic change to the Animal Bed .

items.name: Butchery Bench
items.description: The Butchery Bench is a deployable Tier 3 cooking bench for processing and preparing meats used in various Food recipes. It connects to the Kitchen Bench and Biofuel Stove and shares the same interior wood aesthetic.

items.name: Carpentry Bench
items.description: While it can be placed with no shelter, it would be unusable. Will take damage if left without shelter (or under severely damaged roof) in storms.

items.name: Carved Wood Armchair
items.description: The Carved Wood Armchair is a decorative item.

items.name: Carved Wood Bed
items.description: The Carved Wood Bed allows prospectors to sleep provided it is sufficiently sheltered and it is night time in-game. In a multiplayer game, all prospectors must sleep at the same time to pass the night. Prospectors can set their respawn location to a bed, however if this bed is deconstructed or destroyed, the prospector's spawn location will reset back to the drop-pod.

items.name: Carved Wood Chair
items.description: The Carved Wood Chair is a decorative chair of two varieties, select R when deploying.

items.name: Carved Wood Coffee Table
items.description: The Carved Wood Coffee Table is a decorative item with two varieties, select R when deploying.

items.name: Carved Wood Large Table
items.description: The Carved Wood Large Table is a long wood table with room for 10 seats. The item has two build variants that can be selected with the 'R' key when deploying.

items.name: Carved Wood Round Table
items.description: The Carved Wood Round Table is a decorative round wood table.

items.name: Carved Wood Sitting Bench
items.description: The Carved Wood Sitting Bench is a decorative wooden bench that provides seating and a small bonus to Coziness .

items.name: Carved Wood Table
items.description: The Carved Wood Table is a decorative table with seating for six and a bonus to Coziness .

items.name: Charging Station
items.description: The Charging Station charges basic battery powered devices like the Flashlight and requires 500 Watts to function.

items.name: Chemistry Bench
items.description: Grants the Prospector the ability to swiftly create Medicine , Fertilizer , Volatile Substance and Distilled Miasmic Coating .

items.name: Cloth Chest Armor
items.description: Cloth Armor, while not being very protective in a fight, provides relatively good protection from the heat in deserts. It also makes traveling slightly quicker.

items.name: Composite Chest Armor
items.description: Composite Chest Armor is the highest tier of crafted armor in Icarus and thus provides superior protection from wildlife, while providing considerable insulation from the elements.

items.name: Concrete Furnace
items.description: Made at the Machining Bench , this Tier 3 furnace allows the smelting of mid-tier ores such as Steel Ingot + Super Cooled Ice into Cold Steel Ingots and Titanium Ore into Titanium Ingots .

items.name: Cooking Station
items.description: The Cooking Station is an early-game cooking bench that provides a way to for prospectors to process raw foods into resources, while also giving the prospector access to a variety of new foods with unique status effects.

items.name: Crafting Bench
items.description: The Crafting Bench allows the prospector to craft Tier 2 items. While it can be placed with no shelter, it would be unusable. Will take damage if left without shelter (or under severely damaged roof) in storms.

items.name: Crumbed Saltwater Fillet
items.description: Crumbed Saltwater Fillet is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

items.name: Cured Leather Chest Armor
items.description: Cured Leather Armor is an upgrade to Leather Armor , providing an increase in physical resistance, thermal insulation, and a larger set bonus.
items.crafted_at: Advanced Textiles Bench Electric Textiles Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Advanced Textiles Bench Electric Textiles Bench

items.name: Decoration Bench
items.description: Although prospectors may not use this bench often, it is required to complete the Homestead mission/operation.

items.name: Electric Carpentry Bench
items.description: The Electric Carpentry Bench allows for manufacturing of refined wood deployables at a faster rate than the Carpentry Bench . Prospectors can use the Electric Carpentry Bench to craft furniture, like an improved Wooden Bed , and storage items like an Interior Wood Cupboard . The Electric Carpentry Bench can also create Interior Wood building pieces.

items.name: Electric Furnace
items.description: The Electric Furnace is the end-game furnace capable of smelting Composite Paste into Composites , a material required for most Tier 4 blueprints, and can refine all other minerals faster than the lower tier furnaces.

items.name: Electric Masonry Bench
items.description: The Electric Masonry Bench enables the construction of Stone Building Pieces and Concrete Building Pieces at a faster rate than the Masonry Bench and Cement Mixer , but only once the Prospector researches the blueprints for building pieces. The Electric Masonry Bench can also craft all building pieces made at the Masonry Bench / Advanced Masonry Bench .

items.name: Electric Textiles Bench
items.description: A power connection providing at least 2,500 of power is required to utilize this bench. Allows for the crafting of more advanced Armor sets and items that can be made at the Textiles Bench and Advanced Textiles Bench .

items.name: Fabricator
items.description: The Fabricator is the late-game crafting bench, it enables the crafting of Weapons and Tools like the Combat Knife and a Titanium Pickaxe . It also enables the creation of power sources, such as the Biofuel Generator , and the Refrigerator .

items.name: Forge
items.description: The Forge is the Tier 3 variant of the Anvil Bench that will allow the Prospector to craft higher quality tools such as the Platinum Pickaxe , Cold Steel Knife , etc and items crafted at the Anvil Bench ( Iron Axe , Copper Nails , etc). It is also where these tools can be repaired. Unlike other benches, the Forge can be deployed and used outdoors as it does not require shelter. Can be used indoors or outdoors.

items.name: Fried Chunky Vegetables
items.description: Fried Chunky Vegetables is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

items.name: Fur Chest Armor
items.description: Fur armor is a sidegrade to Leather Armor , offering slightly less physical resistance in exchange for a major boost to cold resistance, making it a necessity when venturing into cold regions. It, however, greatly reduces resistance to heat, making it problematic when delving into hotter biomes.
items.crafted_at: Crafted AtTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Crafted AtTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

items.name: Ghillie Chest Armor
items.description: Ghillie Chest Armor provides protection from the elements while also providing concealment from the keen eyes of prey.
items.crafted_at: Crafted AtTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Crafted AtTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

items.name: Glassworking Bench
items.description: The Glassworking Bench is a mid-to-late game technology that allows Prospectors to create Glass resources and construction elements, like the Glass Window and Glass Roof . In addition, Prospectors can create containers for food and beverages, such as the Glass Bottle and Glass Jar .

items.name: Heated Animal Bed
items.description: The Heated Animal Bed is a bed for Mounts and Pets that has a luxurious theme. It is available as part of the Creature Comforts DLC . Provides no additional attributes and is a cosmetic change to the Animal Bed .

items.name: Heavy Obsidian Chest Armor
items.description: Heavy Obsidian Armor is a Tier 2 armor specialized in heat resistance with a slightly higher physical resistance than Leather Armor and a major boost in armor durability, great for taking on what the volcanic regions of Prometheus have to offer.
items.crafted_at: Crafted AtTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Crafted AtTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

items.name: Herbalism Bench
items.description: Allows for the crafting of Medicinal Pastes and Tonics such as Antibiotic Tonic to cure ailments and afflictions.

items.name: Hunter Chest Armor
items.description: An upgrade to Ghillie Armor with over double the physical/exposure resistance and an increase to crouch movement speed when a full set is worn. The ideal armor for hunting that will give any prospector the advantage over wild game.
items.crafted_at: Advanced Textiles Bench Electric Textiles Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Advanced Textiles Bench Electric Textiles Bench

items.name: Industrial Bed
items.description: The Industrial Bed is made from metal and has an increased sleep quality.

items.name: Industrial Chair
items.description: A minimalist Industrial Chair

items.name: Industrial Coffee Table
items.description: A minimalist Industrial Coffee Table

items.name: Industrial Dining Chair
items.description: A minimalist Industrial Dining Chair

items.name: Industrial Large Table
items.description: A minimalist Industrial Large Table

items.name: Industrial Round Table
items.description: A minimalist Industrial Round Table

items.name: Industrial Sitting Bench
items.description: A minimalist Industrial Sitting Bench

items.name: Industrial Table
items.description: A minimalist Industrial Table

items.name: Jaguar Buffalo Animal Bed
items.description: The Jaguar Buffalo Animal Bed is a bed for Mounts and Pets that has a Jaguar and Buffalo theme. It is available as part of the Creature Comforts DLC . Provides no additional attributes and is a cosmetic change to the Animal Bed .

items.name: Kitchen Bench
items.description: The Kitchen Bench is a mid/late-game crafting bench that expands on cooking foods and it is also the path for creating more advanced medicines.

items.name: Kitchen Storage Block
items.description: A Kitchen Storage Block made of refined wood and copper nails, use it to store your kitchen essentials. Must be snapped to a Kitchen Bench to be placed. It has 40 inventory slots.

items.name: LM Beastmaster Chest Armor
items.description: The LM Beastmaster Chest Armor is part of the LM Beastmaster Armor Set , which can be unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station and is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. The armor set comes with buffs to Mounts and tamed creatures.

items.name: Leather Chest Armor
items.description: Leather armor may not offer much protection when fighting against Icarus' Fauna , but it offers more physical protection and thermal insulation than its Tier 1 counterparts, serving as a decent all-around armor for Tier 2 .
items.crafted_at: Crafted AtTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Crafted AtTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

items.name: MXC Furnace
items.description: The MXC Furnace is unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station and is equipped in the Prospector's loadout before starting a new prospect. The MXC Furnace functions like a smaller, more lightweight Stone Furnace , and allows for processing of Iron Ore , Copper Ore , and Steel Bloom into ingots.

items.name: Machining Bench
items.description: Mid-level crafting system made at the Crafting Bench , the Machining Bench provides access to Tier 3 Blueprints. Prospectors can use it to create Deployables and Firearms .

items.name: Marble Kitchen Bench
items.description: The Marble Kitchen Bench is a late-game crafting bench that expands on cooking foods and contains the recipes that can be found in the Cooking Station . Crafts 50% faster than the Kitchen Bench . A water connection is not required for the Marble Kitchen Bench to function.

items.name: Marble Kitchen Storage
items.description: The Marble Kitchen Storage is used to store kitchen essentials and must be snapped to a Kitchen Bench to be placed. The Marble Kitchen Storage has 40 slots.

items.name: Masonry Bench
items.description: The Masonry Bench enables the construction of Stone Building Pieces and Scoria Building Pieces , but only once the prospector researches the blueprint sets for those building pieces.

items.name: Medicine Bench
items.description: Allows for the crafting of Medicinal Pastes and Tonics such as Antibiotic Pill , Survival Kits and Health Recovery Elixir to cure and prevent ailments and afflictions. It can also be used to craft Volatile Substance and Fertilizer .

items.name: Obsidian Chest Armor
items.description: Obsidian Armor is a sidegrade of Composite Armor , providing slightly more physical resistance and a substantial bonus to heat resistance.

items.name: Plumbed Sink
items.description: The Plumbed Sink is bench that can be connected to other Marble Appliances and, when connected to active water connection, provides a short buff when interacted with. The Buff increases crafting speed, movement speed, health regeneration, and reduced water and food consumption. 250 units of Water is required for the Plumbed Sink to function.

items.name: Portable Beacon
items.description: When deployed, the Portable Beacon will display a map marker that is visible on the map and compass, which is helpful for marking locations of caves/bases/predator spawns/or anything else a Prospector wishes to mark. When interacting with the Portable Beacon, Prospectors can choose from a list of available icons and colors to customize the icon displayed. Must be placed outdoors.

items.name: Portable Biofuel Generator
items.description: The Portable Biofuel Generator generates Electricity when supplied with biofuel from a Biofuel Can .

items.name: Portable Biofuel Tank
items.description: Portable Biofuel Tank is used for Biofuel storage. It is either filled at the Biofuel Composter or Electric Composter .

items.name: Portable Icebox Backpack
items.description: A handy backpack to prevent your food from spoiling on long journeys. Will run for 1 hour on a full charge. Can be recharged at a Charging Station .

items.name: Portable Water Tank
items.description: Portable Water Tank is a deployable that can be connected to a water network once placed to store 150,000 of water and can output 1,000 water per second to keep the network operational. It is the equivalent to a Water Barrel with having half of the storage, but it can be picked up into your character's Backpack/Equipment Slot (G).

items.name: Ranching Station
items.description: The Ranching Station allows the prospector to craft various Tier 2 equipment to use and maintain mounts and pets. This includes several Food Troughs / Water Troughs , Animal Beds , Saddles / Carts , Animal Feed , and other Ranching Deployables . Must be placed outside.

items.name: Regent Animal Bed
items.description: The Regent Animal Bed is a bed for Mounts and Pets that has a luxurious theme. It is available as part of the Creature Comforts DLC . Provides no additional attributes and is a cosmetic change to the Animal Bed .

items.name: Repair Bench
items.description: The Repair Bench has the ability to repair all items youre wearing or have placed on the bench with a single click, regardless of where they were crafted. When combined with a power connection (1,500 electricity ) it can also repair Tier 4 and Orbital Workshop items. To repair Orbital Workshop Items, a Workshop Repair Kit is required.

items.name: Roast Vegetables
items.description: Roast Vegetables is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

items.name: Royal Animal Bed
items.description: The Royal Animal Bed is a bed for Mounts and Pets that has a luxurious theme. It is available as part of the Creature Comforts DLC . Provides no additional attributes and is a cosmetic change to the Animal Bed .

items.name: Rustic Armchair
items.description: The Rustic Armchair seats one prospector

items.name: Rustic Bed
items.description: The Rustic Bed allows prospectors to sleep provided it is sufficiently sheltered and it is night time in-game. In a multiplayer game, all prospectors must sleep at the same time to pass the night. Prospectors can set their respawn location to a bed, however if this bed is deconstructed or destroyed, the prospector's spawn location will reset back to the drop-pod.

items.name: Rustic Coffee Table
items.description: The Rustic Coffee Table allows prospectors to store 10 items

items.name: Rustic Dining Chair
items.description: The Rustic Dining Chair a rustic chair that seats one prospector.

items.name: Rustic Large Table
items.description: The Rustic Large Table is a simple long wooden table.

items.name: Rustic Round Table
items.description: The Rustic Round Table is a simple wooden table.

items.name: Rustic Sitting Bench
items.description: The Rustic Sitting Bench seats two prospectors.

items.name: Rustic Table
items.description: The Rustic Table is a simple wooden table.

items.name: Salting Station
items.description: The Salting Station is an early-game cooking bench that provides a way to for Prospectors to preserve foods using Salt . Once a food is salted, it will receive the Preserved modifier, increasing spoil time by 100%. Salting a food item will reset its spoil timer, even if the item is nearly spoiled. This technique can be used to further extend the spoilage.

items.name: Sandworm Chest Armor
items.description: Sandworm Chest Armor is made from the scales dropped from a Sandworm . Provides exceptional heat protection with the added bonus of poison resistance when worn with a full set of Sandworm Armor .
items.crafted_at: Advanced Textiles Bench Electric Textiles Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Advanced Textiles Bench Electric Textiles Bench

items.name: Scorpion Chest Armor
items.description: Scorpion Chest Armor is a Tier 2 crafted armor requiring a Textiles Bench ; however, it is difficult to acquire due to the challenge of defeating Husk: Extermination and requiring Scorpion Carapace . It has unique set bonuses for returning damage to the attacker and has one of the highest physical resistances in the game.

items.name: Skinning Bench
items.description: The Skinning Bench is used to process, the small to medium carcasses, of the Fauna found on Icarus. While the yields from the skinning bench differ from skinning wildlife with Knives , most notably is the ability to always obtain rarer cuts of meat from fauna such as Raw Stringy Meat .

items.name: Snow Leopard Skin Animal Bed
items.description: The Snow Leopard Skin Animal Bed is a bed for Mounts and Pets that has a snow leopard theme. It is available as part of the Creature Comforts DLC . Provides no additional attributes and is a cosmetic change to the Animal Bed .

items.name: Sprinters Animal Feed
items.description: Sprinters Animal Feed is a Animal Feed for Pets or Mounts with a unique Status Effect . Can be fed to mounts to satisfy Hunger . Sprinters Animal Feed decays in 10,800 seconds, but that decay can be slowed down by storing Sprinters Animal Feed inside an Ice Box or Refrigerator .

items.name: Stone Furnace
items.description: The Stone Furnace is used for smelting metals such as Iron Ore , Copper Ore , or Steel Bloom . Will take damage in storms if left un-sheltered.

items.name: Striker Terrenus Animal Bed
items.description: The Striker Terrenus Animal Bed is a bed for Mounts and Pets that has an... unsettling theme. It is available as part of the Creature Comforts DLC . Provides no additional attributes and is a cosmetic change to the Animal Bed .

items.name: Textiles Bench
items.description: Allows for the crafting of various Armor sets, such as the Leather Armor Set , Fur Armor Set , Ghillie Armor Set , Sandworm Armor Set , and the Scorpion Armor Set . Items like the Basic Riding Saddle , Simple Creature Deterrent and Rope can also be made at the Textiles Bench.

items.name: Trophy Bench
items.description: The Trophy Bench allows prospectors to create Trophies from various Vestiges , for eventual display around a building or outpost.

items.name: Vegetable Oil
items.description: Vegetable Oil is an intermediary resource used to create Biofuel , Cured Leather , a Submachine Gun and various Food recipes.

items.name: Vegetable Pie
items.description: Vegetable Pie is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

items.name: Vegetable Roll
items.description: Vegetable Roll is a Food with a unique Status Effect , which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger .

items.name: Wayfarer Chest Armor
items.description: Wayfarer Chest Armor is a mid-game Tier 3 crafted armor which can aid prospectors traveling through the Deserts on Icarus.
items.crafted_at: Advanced Textiles Bench Electric Textiles Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Advanced Textiles Bench Electric Textiles Bench

items.name: Wolfskin Animal Bed
items.description: The Wolfskin Animal Bed is a bed for Mounts and Pets that has a wolf theme. It is available as part of the Creature Comforts DLC . Provides no additional attributes and is a cosmetic change to the Animal Bed .

items.name: Wood Table
items.description: The Wood Table is a decorative item that can be used for deployables like the Mortar and Pestle and provides a bonus to Coziness .

items.name: Wooden Bed
items.description: The Wooden Bed allows prospectors to sleep provided it is sufficiently sheltered and it is night time in-game. In a multiplayer game, all prospectors must sleep at the same time to pass the night. Prospectors can set their respawn location to a bed, however if this bed is deconstructed or destroyed, the prospector's spawn location will reset back to the drop-pod.

items.name: Wooden Chair
items.description: A Wooden Chair made of refined wood and copper nails.

items.name: Zebra Animal Bed
items.description: The Zebra Animal Bed is a bed for Mounts and Pets that has a zebra theme. It is available as part of the Creature Comforts DLC . Provides no additional attributes and is a cosmetic change to the Animal Bed .
